roleset.name: emboider with worsted yarn

example.name: He was a crewel man, but fair.
example.text: My husband creweled a picture of a bird cage just like this with a spider plant growing in it!
example.arg: a picture of a bird cage just like this with a spider plant growing in it!

example.name: args 0, MNR
example.text: [What tools]-1 do you use to crewel ?

example.name: arg1
example.text: i creweled a shirt and have started on a skirt, and even though it is totally dorky, i really like the way they are turning out.

roleset.note: CREWEL-V NOTES: Added by Julia for Questionbank. (from crewel.01-v)
